__e: I know you are very modest, but I beg you in the name of Naples, in the name of all... who suffers the way you suffered, otherwise they won't made you into a saint.

I keep a modest establishment. One must be careful with money these days. But, if there's anything you desire...
For almost 12 years, Kurt went to work every morning and came home to me every night and we lived modestly and happily.
